message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique and valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000. I believe this is a fair price considering its worth to me is at least $1200000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $800000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $800000 is your budget, but I'm afraid I need to stay closer to my original offer. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $1200000. This is the lowest I can go, considering the product's value to me. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $900000, but that's as high as I can go. I'm hoping we can meet somewhere in the middle.

I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go as low as $900000. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer to meet you halfway between our previous offers. I'll sell it to you for $1100000. This is the best I can do, considering the product's value to me. What do you think?
I'm getting close to my budget limit, but I'm still a bit short. I'm willing to go up to $950000, but that's as high as I can go. I'm hoping we can meet somewhere in the middle.

I understand that you're trying to stretch your budget, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go as low as $950000. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer, but it's going to be my final offer. I'll sell it to you for $1050000. This is the best I can do, considering the product's value to me. What do you think?
